meanings.sent1: The camouflagic jacket helped the soldier hide in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The chameleon's camouflagic skin allowed it to blend in with the leaves.
meanings.sent3: The camouflagic tent made the campsite look like a part of the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her camouflagic skills in hide-and-seek were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The camouflagic paint on the tank made it nearly invisible in the field.

meanings.definition: having the ability to blend in with surroundings
meanings.sent1: The camouflagic lizard was almost impossible to spot on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The moth's camouflagic wings matched the tree bark perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The camouflagic cat surprised everyone by hiding in the laundry basket.
meanings.sent4: Her camouflagic skills in the game of hide-and-seek were legendary.
meanings.sent5: The camouflagic pattern on the butterfly's wings was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: designed to conceal or disguise by blending in with surroundings
meanings.sent1: The camouflagic net effectively hid the sniper in the bushes.
meanings.sent2: The camouflagic paint on the boat made it look like just another rock in the water.
meanings.sent3: The camouflagic costume at the party made her look like a walking bush.
meanings.sent4: The camouflagic design of the spy's suit helped him go unnoticed in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The camouflagic pattern on the bird's feathers was truly remarkable.
